verses.verse: וַיָּ֕שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> with me came again הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֑י וַיְעִירֵ֕נִי <S%H5782><s%> and waked כְּאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me as a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יֵע֥וֹר <S%H5782><s%> that is wakened מִשְּׁנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8142><s%> out of his sleep

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> I רֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> unto me What seest [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> said ק) רָאִ֣יתִי ׀ <S%H7200><s%> I have looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מְנוֹרַת֩ <S%H4501><s%> and behold a candlestick זָהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> all [of] gold כֻּלָּ֜הּ <S%H3605><s%> all וְגֻלָּ֣הּ <S%H1543><s%> bowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשָׁ֗הּ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> of it and his seven נֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5216><s%> lamps עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> thereon and seven וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <S%H7651><s%> to the seven מֽוּצָק֔וֹת <S%H4166><s%> pipes לַנֵּר֖וֹת <S%H5216><s%> lamps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H7218><s%> which [are] upon the top

וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> And two זֵיתִ֖ים <S%H2132><s%> olive trees עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> by it one מִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> upon the right הַגֻּלָּ֔ה <S%H1543><s%> [side] of the bowl וְאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and the other עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂמֹאלָֽהּ׃ <S%H8040><s%> upon the left

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> So I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֖י לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> with me saying מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> master

וַ֠יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> with me answered הַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <S%H4397><s%> Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּי֙ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> unto me Knowest מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thou not what these be? And I said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> No my lord

וַיַּ֜עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then he answered וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and spake אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> This דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> unto Zerubbabel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor בְחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> Not by might וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor בְכֹ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> nor by power כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but בְּרוּחִ֔י <S%H7307><s%> but by my spirit אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> What אַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> you הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> hill הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> Who [art] thou O great לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> accept זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> Zerubbabel לְמִישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> [thou shalt become] a plain וְהוֹצִיא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and he shall bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הָרֹאשָׁ֔ה <S%H7222><s%> the top תְּשֻׁא֕וֹת <S%H8663><s%> [thereof with] shoutings חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> [crying] Grace חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace לָֽהּ׃ פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> The hands זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> of Zerubbabel יִסְּד֛וּ <S%H3248><s%> foundation הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> of this house הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְיָדָ֣יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands תְּבַצַּ֑עְנָה <S%H1214><s%> shall also finish וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <S%H3045><s%> it and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who בַז֮ <S%H937><s%> contempt לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day קְטַנּוֹת֒ <S%H6996><s%> of small וְשָׂמְח֗וּ <S%H8055><s%> will be glad וְרָא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> and shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֧בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones הַבְּדִ֛יל <S%H913><s%> plummet בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> in the hand זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> of Zerubbabel שִׁבְעָה־ <S%H7651><s%> [with] those seven אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> they [are] the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> which מְשׁוֹטְטִ֖ים <S%H7751><s%> which run to and fro בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> through the whole earth

וָאַ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> I and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What שְּׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> unto him What [are] these two הַזֵּיתִים֙ <S%H2132><s%> olive trees הָאֵ֔לֶה <S%H428><s%> are these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> upon the right הַמְּנוֹרָ֖ה <S%H4501><s%> [side] of the candlestick וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and upon שְׂמֹאולָֽהּ׃ <S%H8040><s%> and upon the left

וָאַ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> And I answered שֵׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> again וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What שְׁתֵּ֞י <S%H8147><s%> unto him What [be these] two שִׁבֲּלֵ֣י <S%H7641><s%> branches הַזֵּיתִ֗ים <S%H2132><s%> olive אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בְּיַ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> which through שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two צַנְתְּר֣וֹת <S%H6804><s%> pipes הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> golden הַֽמְרִיקִ֥ים <S%H7324><s%> empty מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and הַזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> the golden

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> me and said הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Knowest מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thou not what these [be]? And I said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> No my lord

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> he These [are] the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ones הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <S%H3323><s%> anointed הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> that stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by אֲד֥וֹן <S%H113><s%> by the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth
